name: Doodle Diamonds - Third Reward
description:
Come to play this fun and addictive match 3 game. Slide diamonds to combine them, when 3 or more gems are connected you create a match.

Your mission is to combine elements that are inside the colorful tiles to remove all colors inside them. Each level has a different numbers of color tiles and different locations.

Use boosters to help you complete your missions.

Get free coins to purchase boosters through the daily rewards

0e920a6070
